pre_caption: This video presents a dramatic landscape scenery shot, where the primary focus is on the vastness of the environment and the atmospheric spectacle rather than a specific subject. Luminous, curtain-like bands of the green aurora borealis dominate the star-dusted night sky, appearing to radiate from a point on the left and stretching across the entire frame. Below, a flat, expansive snow-covered landscape is sparsely populated with a small, brightly lit white building that emits a plume of white steam or smoke. A line of dark evergreen trees forms the distant horizon, punctuated by two small, blinking red lights on unseen towers.
